name: algebra.js
description: Build, display, and solve algebraic equations.

scripts.coveralls: nyc --reporter=lcovonly --reporter=text --reporter=text-summary jasmine --config=jasmine.json  && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | npx coveralls && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.minify: npm run bundle && uglifyjs --mangle --beautify ascii_only=true,beautify=false build/algebra-${npm_package_version}.js > build/algebra-${npm_package_version}.min.js
scripts.sync: npm run minify && git checkout gh-pages && cp build/*.min.js javascripts
scripts.version: conventional-changelog --preset conventionalcommits --infile CHANGELOG.md --same-file --append && prettier --write CHANGELOG.md && git add CHANGELOG.md

author: Nicole White
